Dilworth teacher and sex offender Robert Wynyard dies after compassionate release from prison https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dilworth-teacher-and-sex-offender-robert-wynyard-dies-after-compassionate-release-from-prison/A2SKOG34FFBEBEUMOZUAQFFTNA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dilworth-teacher-and-sex-offender-robert-wynyard-dies-after-compassionate-release-from-prison/A2SKOG34FFBEBEUMOZUAQFFTNA/ Jeremy WilkinsonRobert Wynward sexually abused eight young boys at the Auckland boarding school. Silent, masked trio beat parents, 3yo with bat after forcing way into Epsom motel https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/silent-masked-trio-beat-parents-3yo-with-bat-after-forcing-way-into-epsom-motel/5IZJIVSE2FH5ZGHXKMMWKSJQRQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/silent-masked-trio-beat-parents-3yo-with-bat-after-forcing-way-into-epsom-motel/5IZJIVSE2FH5ZGHXKMMWKSJQRQ/ Craig KapitanThe attack stopped only after the bat split in two. Fri, 17 Jan 2025 05:04:53 +0000 Co-defendants (left to right) Johel Vui, Miracle Sau and Emmanuel Pritchard appear in Auckland District Court for sentencing on Jan 17, 2025, one year after forcing their way into an Epsom motel room and violently attacking two adults and their 3-year-old son in a case of what the Crown called "home invasion for hire". Photo / Michael Craig

Hamilton shoplifter Kenneth Waaka threatens to rape Specsavers staffer during theft https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/hamilton-shoplifter-kenneth-waaka-threatens-to-rape-specsavers-staffer-during-theft/XYPR47NCLFEUVPNNJNQ523L7UY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/hamilton-shoplifter-kenneth-waaka-threatens-to-rape-specsavers-staffer-during-theft/XYPR47NCLFEUVPNNJNQ523L7UY/ Belinda FeekThe 44-year-old smelled strongly of alcohol and had slurred speech. Fri, 17 Jan 2025 04:11:20 +0000 Shoplifter Kenneth Waaka threatened to rape and kill a Hamilton Specsavers staff member while stealing six pairs of glasses, in one of several incidents days apart last year. Photo / Belinda Feek
‘Tough decision’: Ophthalmologist Graham Wilson reflects on leaving Gisborne after 17 years https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/tough-decision-o善眼科医师-graham-wilson-reflects-on-leaving-gisborne-after-17-years/JZIRD6OBZ5B73BX4OFSZB6S42U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/tough-decision-o善眼科医师-graham-wilson-reflects-on-leaving-gisborne-after-17-years/JZIRD6OBZ5B73BX4OFSZB6S42U/ Wynsley WrigleyGraham Wilson to make monthly Gisborne visits; praises local eye team as 'great'. Fri, 17 Jan 2025 04:00:00 +0000 Long-serving Gisborne ophthalmologist Graham Wilson says it was a tough decision to move to Christchurch. He treated about 4000 patients a year and enjoyed living in a small community where he often ran into his patients. Photo / Paul Rickard
